mapper.select: SELECT mo.materialOrderCode as materialOrderCode, mo.mainBusinessCode as mainBusinessCode, mo.contractCode as contractCode, mo.clientCode as clientCode, mo.totalCount as totalCount, mo.totalPrice as totalPrice, mo.orderDate as orderDate, mo.predictDate as predictDate, mo.status as status, mo.briefs as briefs, mo.managerId as managerId, mo.regDate as regDate, mo.updateDate as updateDate, c.businessName as businessName FROM k1_tb_material_order AS mo INNER join k1_tb_client AS c on mo.mainBusinessCode = c.mainBusinessCode
